titles.title: Providing for the further consideration in the Committee of the Whole of the bill (H.R. 1868) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-167, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1868. Providing for the further consideration of the bill in the Committee of the Whole. Specified amendments are in order. Only those amendments contained in the report accompanying this resolution shall be in order, and shall not be subject to further amendment or a demand for a division in the House or in the Committee of the Whole. Each amendment shall be debatable for twenty minutes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 67.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 162 (Roll no. 478).
Mr. Volkmer moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Goss moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 167 (Roll no. 479).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 156 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: Mr. Solomon moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Goss moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 153 (Roll no. 481).

bill.summary: 6/29/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the further consideration of H.R. 1868 (foreign operations appropriations).
